title: What is CS0428?
labels: All compiler errors have to be fixed

sections.title: Symptoms
content: When trying to enter play mode, I am receiving the error below:

error CS0428: Cannot convert method group `__' to non-delegate type `__'
Consider using parentheses to invoke the method

sections.title: Cause
content: The CS0428 error is caused when converting a method group to a non-delegate type, or attempting to invoke a method without using parentheses.

error CS0428: Cannot convert method group `GetComponent' to non-delegate
type `EnemyScript'. Consider using parentheses to invoke the method

sections.title: Resolution
content: To fix the CS0428 error you will need to add the parentheses where they are expected.
